About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

From a very young age I was interested in tech when all we had to play with was small radios, Now we have computers so have naturally progressed where today.

Being a native to Aotearoa who loves my country and a programmer with a passion for learning. I would like nothing better than to get your business or app idea up and running.

Here's a little run down of what I can do for you...

The Engineer

Full Stack Developer

I have worked with current technologies such as the latest versions of Javascript, React with Redux, Handlebars, Python along with HTML on the front-end and node.js with express and SQLite, MongoDB etc on the back-end.

The Designer

Front End Developer

The part the customer sees begins with but is not limited to technologies such as HTML 5, CSS 3, material UI SASS and Styled components to name a few but you can begin to imagine that you can build exquisite things of beauty on the screen.

The Imagineer

Designer

A digital designer is the culmination of a good eye and natural artistic qualities which involve imagination and technologies, sometimes pushing the envelope a bit until it becomes a work of digital art.
